title: Parrot's Clue
summary: Board a pirate sloop, win the crew's trust, and uncover the captain's hidden map.

player.name: Adventurer
player.description: A curious wanderer with a knack for solving riddles.

locations.name: Main Deck
locations.description: Rolling waves slap against the hull as the salty wind cuts across the deck.
locations.details: Barrels, coils of rope, and a patched sail frame the cramped deck of the sloop. The captain's cabin sits aft, its weathered door watched over by wary eyes.

objects.name: cabin door
objects.description: A heavy oak door with iron bands guards the captain's quarters.
objects.details: The hinges look recently oiled. A simple latch keeps it shut from this side.

actors.name: First Mate Briggs
actors.description: A scar-chinned pirate with a braided beard and a suspicious glare.
actors.persona: Gruff but loyal to the captain, secretly eager for shore leave.
actors.background: Briggs has sailed with the captain for a decade and keeps the crew in line.

dialogue.default: Briggs grunts, 'Keep yer hands where I can see 'em, landlubber.'
dialogue.cabin: 'Cabin's off limits unless the captain says otherwise,' Briggs warns.

actors.name: Scarlet
actors.description: A brilliant red parrot perched near the rigging, eyes gleaming with mischief.
actors.persona: Sharp-tongued mimic who repeats gossip she shouldn't know.
actors.background: The captain rescued Scarlet from a sinking brig. Now she hoards secrets.

dialogue.default: Scarlet squawks, 'Pieces of eight! Mind the captain!'
dialogue.map: 'Map's in the cabin! Map's in the cabin!' Scarlet screeches.

pathways.name: cabin door
pathways.description: The door leading into the captain's cabin.

locations.name: Captain's Cabin
locations.description: Lantern light spills across a cramped cabin cluttered with charts and nautical tools.
locations.details: A writing desk is bolted to the floor beside a brass compass. The smell of salt, ink, and pipe smoke lingers in the air.

objects.name: treasure map
objects.description: A cracked parchment map inked with island silhouettes and dotted lines.
objects.details: A red X marks a secluded cove on Skullfang Isle.

pathways.name: deck
pathways.description: Steps back out onto the deck.
